snippet: The sons of the former Egyptian president were convicted in May on charges of siphoning off millions of dollars in public funds for personal use.
abstract: Cairo court orders release of Alaa and Gamal Mubarak, sons of former Pres Hosni Mubarak, from jail; rules that sons, who were convicted on corruption charges in May and slapped with three-year prison sentences, had already served sentence given amount of time they were detained before trial.
lead_paragraph: The sons of the former Egyptian president were convicted in May on charges of siphoning off millions of dollars in public funds for personal use.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Court Orders Mubarak’s Sons to Be Released
headline.main: Cairo Court Orders Release of Hosni Mubarak’s Jailed Sons
